title: Industrial AI & Automation
subtitle: Predictive Maintenance, Quality Control, and Smart Supply Chain
description: Transform manufacturing operations with AI-powered predictive maintenance, automated quality control, and intelligent supply chain management. This practical track equips operations teams with skills to implement Industry 4.0 AI solutions on the factory floor.
prerequisites: Experience in manufacturing or industrial operations
Familiarity with industrial equipment and sensors (helpful)
learning_objectives: Implement predictive maintenance systems that reduce unplanned downtime by 30-50%
Deploy AI-powered quality control for defect detection and process optimization
Optimize supply chain operations using demand forecasting and inventory AI
Integrate AI solutions with existing manufacturing systems (MES, ERP, SCADA)
Build a business case and ROI model for manufacturing AI investments

modules.title: AI in Manufacturing: The Industry 4.0 Foundation
modules.description: Understanding AI's role in smart manufacturing transformation
lessons: Industry 4.0 and the AI Manufacturing Revolution
AI vs. Traditional Automation: Understanding the Difference
Data Infrastructure for Manufacturing AI (IoT, Sensors, Edge)
Building the Business Case: ROI of Manufacturing AI

modules.title: Predictive Maintenance
modules.description: AI-powered equipment health monitoring and failure prediction
lessons: From Reactive to Predictive: The Maintenance Maturity Model
Sensor Data Collection and Feature Engineering
Anomaly Detection Algorithms for Equipment Monitoring
Failure Prediction Models: Classification and Time-to-Failure
Integration with CMMS and Maintenance Workflows
Case Study: Reducing Downtime in CNC Operations

modules.title: AI-Powered Quality Control
modules.description: Automated inspection and defect detection systems
lessons: Computer Vision for Defect Detection
Surface Inspection and Dimensional Analysis
Statistical Process Control Enhanced by AI
Root Cause Analysis with Machine Learning
Case Study: Automated Visual Inspection in Electronics Assembly

modules.title: Supply Chain Optimization
modules.description: AI for demand forecasting, inventory, and logistics
lessons: Demand Forecasting with Machine Learning
Inventory Optimization: Safety Stock and Reorder Points
Supplier Risk Assessment and Alternative Sourcing
Production Scheduling Optimization
Logistics and Route Optimization

modules.title: Process Optimization and Digital Twins
modules.description: Advanced AI applications for manufacturing excellence
lessons: Process Parameter Optimization with AI
Digital Twin Concepts for Manufacturing
Energy Optimization in Manufacturing
Generative AI for Design and Engineering

modules.title: Implementation and Integration
modules.description: Practical deployment of manufacturing AI solutions
lessons: Integration with MES, ERP, and SCADA Systems
Edge AI vs. Cloud: Choosing the Right Architecture
Change Management on the Factory Floor
Scaling from Pilot to Plant-Wide Deployment

certification.name: Certified Industrial AI Specialist (CIAIS)
requirements: Complete all 6 modules with minimum 75% assessment score
Submit capstone project: Predictive Maintenance Implementation Plan
Pass final practical examination with simulation scenarios
certification.renewal: 15 continuing education hours or recertification exam

includes: ROI calculator and business case templates

technology_partners: IoT platform agnostic (Azure IoT, AWS IoT, PTC ThingWorx)
